hackathon-judges.judge-role: Director of Social Innovation & Impact, TOMs
U.S. Digital Services at White House

hackathon-requirements:
Link to YouTube Video.
Upload Marketing plan in PDF.
Upload screen cast/website

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winning team participates in a Job Shadow Program of a lifetime+ VIP access to Fashion Week in February 2017, AND see's their design put into production and sold on Verizon and Apple!

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=140 West St, New York, NY 10007, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Projects are weighted as follows: iPhone case – 40%, web page/e-commerce site – 30%, marketing plan – 15%, overall design – 15%. Weighted scoring does not diminish the fact that cross-discipline collaboration is key to making a successful final project.

hackathon-location-address: 140 West St, New York, NY 10007, USA
